verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The more I seek You
The more I find You
The more I find You
The more I love You

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I wanna sit at your feet
Drink from the cup in Your hands
Lay back against You and breathe
Feel Your heart beat
This love is so deep
It's more than I can stand
I Melt in Your peace
It's overwhelming
